message.content:
First, identify the line item that indicates the total amount of tax an entity is expected to pay or recover during the reporting period.  

From the provided income statement, the relevant line item is "Tax Expense," which typically represents the tax payable or recoverable for the period.  

The amount listed under "Tax Expense" on the given report is 42584.04.  

Thus, the specific line item and value of total tax related to this reporting period are:  

Line Item: Tax Expense  
Value: 42584.04

{"solution": {"value": "42584.04"}}
